seo.title_override: Atlanta Mattress Disposal Guide 2026 | Easy & Eco-Friendly
seo.meta_desc_override: Atlanta residents, dispose of your mattress easily! Enjoy curbside pickup with no fines. Learn the rules for hassle-free mattress removal in 2026.

hero_hook: Tired of your old mattress taking up space, especially on a rainy Atlanta day?
neighborhoods: Midtown, Buckhead, Old Fourth Ward, Virginia-Highland, Inman Park, Candler Park, Grant Park, West End, East Atlanta Village, Little Five Points, Ansley Park, Cabbagetown, Kirkwood, Druid Hills, Morningside-Lenox Park

curbside_rules.placement_time: Place in green cart(s) curbside no later than 7 a.m. on collection day. Remove cart(s) by 9 a.m. the day after collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: 96-gallon roll cart for solid waste collection.

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Atlanta averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.
